name: Blind Berry test
description:
Basically the goal is to stay alive whilst platforming and avoiding enemies, there's a view that's decreasing and objects outside this border will become invisible. 

The way to increase this view is to collect these berries. There are some small graphical bugs with the trail effect I'm trying to squish. Inspired by that one galaxy in super mario galaxy 2. 

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

A and D - move left and right

W - jump (up to 2 times at a time)
